title: Exponentiation Function
description: This function calculates the exponentiation of a real number X raised to the power N, where N can be a positive or negative integer. The function handles negative exponents by returning the reciprocal of the result and utilizes bitwise operations for efficient computation.
name: EXPN

input.name: X
input.description: The base value which is a real number.

input.name: N
input.description: The exponent value which is an integer. It can be positive or negative.

output.name: EXPN
output.description: The result of the calculation, representing X raised to the power of N.

return_value.description: The real number result of the exponentiation.
